LocaleResource.Name: Nop.Plugin.XcellenceIt.Sms.Title.HelpnDocument
LocaleResource.Value: Help Document

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.MobileNumberVerification
LocaleResource.Value: Hello %Customer.FullName%,Thank you for registering with %Store.Name%. Your phone verification code is %NopSmsCustomAttributes.OneTimePassword%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderPlaced
LocaleResource.Value: Hello %Order.CustomerFullName%, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been placed successfully on %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.ShipmentInitiated
LocaleResource.Value: Hi,Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% is on the way. Shipment number %Shipment.ShipmentNumber% via %Order.ShippingMethod%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderDelivered
LocaleResource.Value: Hi, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been delivered successfully. Keep shopping %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderCancelled
LocaleResource.Value: Hello, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been cancelled. In case of any issues you can write us at %Store.Email% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderNoteUpdated
LocaleResource.Value: %Store.Name%: Hello %Customer.FullName%, %Order.NewNoteText%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderProcessing
LocaleResource.Value: Hello %Customer.FullName%, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been approved and processing has been started. Thank you, %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.PaymentRefundInitiated
LocaleResource.Value: Hello %Customer.FullName%, Payment refund has been initiated for your order number %Order.OrderNumber%. Thank you, %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderReturnStatusChanged
LocaleResource.Value: Hello %Customer.FullName%, Your return request: %ReturnRequest.CustomNumber% status has been changed to %ReturnRequest.Status%. Thank you, %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderComplete
LocaleResource.Value: Hi, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been completed successfully. Keep shopping %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.OrderPaid
LocaleResource.Value: Hi, Your order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been paid successfully. Keep shopping %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Customer.ReturnRequestReceived
LocaleResource.Value: A new return request has been received for order number %Order.OrderNumber% in %Store.Name%.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Admin.NewCustomerRegistration
LocaleResource.Value: A new customer %Customer.FullName% has registered on store %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Admin.NewOrderPlacedInStore
LocaleResource.Value: A new order placed on %Store.Name%. Order number: %Order.OrderNumber%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Admin.NewOrderCompletedInStore
LocaleResource.Value: Order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been completed successfully on %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Admin.NewOrderPaidInStore
LocaleResource.Value: A new order %Order.OrderNumber% has been paid in %Store.Name%.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Admin.ReturnRequestReceived
LocaleResource.Value: A new return request has been received for order number %Order.OrderNumber% in %Store.Name%.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.OrderPlacedforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: A new order placed on %Store.Name%. Order number: %Order.OrderNumber%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.OrderDeliveredforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: Hello, Order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been delivered successfully to customer.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.OrderCancelforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: Hello, Order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been cancelled. In case of any issues you can write us at %Store.Email% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.OrderCompletedforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: Order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been completed successfully on %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.RefundCompletedforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: Hello, Refund for order number %Order.OrderNumber% has been completed on %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.XcellenceIt.Sms.MessageTemplate.Vendor.OrderPaidforVendorTemplate
LocaleResource.Value: Order number %Order.OrderNumber% for your product has been paid successfully on %Store.URL% - %Store.Name%
